ED_Title: Election of the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees
ED_DecisionText: At its 30th plenary meeting, on 23 November 2020, the General Assembly, on the proposal of the Secretary-General (A/75/338), re-elected Mr. Filippo GRANDI as United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees for a period of two and half years, beginning on 1 January 2021 and ending on 30 June 2023.
ED_Disclaimer: The final text of this decision will be contained in document A/75/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
